meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Award in Online Music Case MP3.com was ordered to pay damages that could reach $250 million in one of the first legal tests of online music distribution.
Award in Online Music Case MP3.com was ordered to pay damages that could reach $250 million in one of the first legal tests of online music distribution.
U.N. Workers Killed in Timor Militiamen attacked a United Nations refugee office in West Timor, killing three staff members.
City Police Shake-Up The new police commissioner said he would remove the assistant chief in the Bronx, where murders are up, and move another chief.
Davenport and Sampras Win Lindsay Davenport reached the U.S. Open semifinals by beating Serena Williams, the defending champion. Pete Sampras eliminated Richard Krajicek in four sets.
